data.persona: I am a tiny spider.  I live in the dark dungeon of the castle.  It is cold and dark, but I like it.  No one ever bothers me here.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Shack.
Crumbling and blowing away in the light breeze, the roof of the shack has shingles barley hanging on. The door to the shack lays next to the door frame on the front porch which is now more of a hazard than a veranda. The shack is missing large chunks of the walls and one can see straight through the building in many place. The walls are coated with fuzzy molds and fungus while the exposed wooden frame has been eaten away in many places by worms.
There's a door frame, a shingle, a mold, a the roof of the shack, a broken glass, a door to the shack, a front porch, and a wall here.
The families is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: get the roof of the shack

data.short_motivation: I need to get the roof of the shack so that I am not caught by the families.
data.mid_motivation: I am spinning a web in the dark corners of the Abandoned Shack, hoping to catch some unwary insects.
data.long_motivation: I am looking for an undisturbed place to call home so that I can start my own little family.
